js.content: document.head.innerHTML='<style>@-webkit-keyframes a{from{'+(C='-webkit-filter:custom('+(v='url("data:,#V vec3#F float#O 0.#I 1.#Z V(O)#A a_position#K length#M void main()#N normalize#C cos(T#R i.a-i.n*1e-6#B ;if(O<t#G B&&t<K(i.a))i=f(b+t*d%0Aprecision mediump F;varying V d;uniform F T;'.replace(/#/g,'%0A#define '))+'attribute vec4 A;M{gl_Position=vec4(A.xyz,.5);d=N(V(A.xy,I));}") '+v+'struct f{V a,n,k;};f w(F r,V c,V k,V b,V d,f i){V a=c-b;F x=dot(d,a),t=x*x+r-dot(a,a)B){t=x-sqrt(t)G,N(t*d-c),k);}return i;}f q(V b,V d){f i=f(V(99.),Z,Z);V a=V(O,.6,T*3.),k=V(.6,I,O);F t=d.y;B){t=(a-b).y/t;a=ceil(mod(a-t*d,2.))G,V(O,-I,O),a.xzx);}return w(.1,V(C*3.+I),C*2.),2.5),k.yzx,b,d,w(.2,V(C+I),C*5.),2.),k.zxy,b,d,w(.4,V(C*4.),C*3.+I),3.),k,b,d,i)));}M{V a=V(I),n=-N(a),c,b,d=d;for(int j=0;j<8;j++){f i=q(b,d);if(i.k==Z||q(R,n).k!=Z)break;c+=(a*=i.k)*dot(i.n,n)*max(O,I-K(i.a)*.1);b=R;d=reflect(d,i.n);}gl_FragColor=vec4(c,I);}"),99,T ')+'0)}to{'+C+'44)}}body{width:96vh;height:96vh;-webkit-animation:a 99s linear 0 99}'
